synopsis.text:
Boku no Hero Academia: All Might - Rising The Animation delves into the untold story of All Might, the world's mightiest hero, and his rise to power through the extraordinary ability "One for All." This exclusive animation is part of the Blu-ray release of "My Hero Academia: Two Heroes."

Accompanying the Blu-ray/DVD version of My Hero Academia the Movie: Two Heroes, two bonus episodes offer a deeper look into All Might's past. The first episode draws from a one-shot manga featured in Vol. Origin, unveiling All Might's journey to becoming the No.1 hero. The second episode serves as an epilogue picture drama to the movie.

The Blu-ray/DVD release of Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero includes two short specials. The first episode, based on a one-shot manga, explores All Might's past, while the second episode is an epilogue picture drama for the movie.

Two short OVAs come with the Blu-ray/DVD of Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero. The first episode is a brief animation that reveals All Might's history, while the second episode serves as an epilogue picture drama for the movie.
